synopsis.text: Magic, mystery, and a touch of vacation bliss await Tatsuya and Miyuki, siblings with unique academic standings, as they wrap up their first year at Magic High School. With the changing seasons heralding the arrival of spring, the pair, along with their friends, retreat to their private villa nestled within the picturesque Ogasawara Island. As they revel in their brief respite, the unexpected arrival of a young girl named Kokoa disrupts their tranquility. Having fled from a naval base, Kokoa shares with Tatsuya a single, heartfelt wish, setting the stage for an intriguing tale of adventure and enchantment.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
